metadata.title: Tuesday, 27th November, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
parts: (a)    how much money was raised by the Zambia International Trade Fair (ZITF) from 2006 to 2011, year by year;
(b)    whether the ZITF had a deficit or surplus in the period at (a); and
(c)    what the major cause(s) of the deficit, if any, was.

questions.minister: Minister of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection what the percentage of Zambian women that owned land in the country was as of 31st March, 2012.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate: (Head 46/01: under consideration): (The Minister of Health). Heads 46/02, 46/06, 46/07, 46/08, 46/09, 46/10, 46/11, 46/12, 46/13, 46/14, 46/15, 46/16, 46/17, 46/18, 46/19, 21/01, 37/01, 37/02, 37/04, 37/06, 37/07, 37/08, 37/09, 37/10, 37/11, 37/12, 37/13, 37/14, 76/01, 76/02 and 76/03 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 46    -    Ministry of Health Head 21    -    Loans and Investments – Ministry of Finance Head 37    -    Ministry of Finance Head 76    -    Ministry of Youth and Sport
